long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Client Management fields to the Elegant Themes API page. This extension simply adds a 'Client Name' and 'Client URL' field to your API keys. The information is saved in local storage, which means the only person who ever has access to it, is you.
